name: Sneaky Pizza
description:
Sneaky Pizza is a top-down-3D-stealth-game, placed in a post-apocalyptic world, in which you have to help the pizza-bot "Troy" to deliver the last pizza ever served.

Good luck ! It won't will be so easy...

Features

  • Puzzle tactic-tasks
  • Doors with different switches
  • Dodging enemies and towers
  • Chased by enemies
  • Hidden apocalypse mode

Keyboard Controls

You control the game with

W = move Troy forward

A = turn leaft

S = turn right

D = move Troy backwards

Sneaky Pizza is developed by a team from the first semester at the School4Games. Refer find on our site.
